articles.title: Patriots vs. Raiders live updates: Will New England start Mike Vrabel era with a win?
articles.description:
Drake Maye and the Patriots are set to open a new season on Sunday at a rainy Gillette Stadium.

The post Patriots vs. Raiders live updates: Will New England start Mike Vrabel era with a win? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots open season against Raiders on September 10 at Gillette Stadium.
Drake Maye will debut as starting quarterback for New England.
Fans expect a new era under coach Mike Vrabel amid rainy conditions.

articles.title: Watch: Dropkick Murphys blast Trump, but stump for a longshot New England candidate
articles.description:
"The Democratic Party needs people like him."

The post Watch: Dropkick Murphys blast Trump, but stump for a longshot New England candidate appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Dropkick Murphys support New England candidate in upcoming elections.

Their endorsement aims to energize local Democratic voters ahead of 2025 elections.

articles.title: Tenants move into first downtown apartment in Wu’s office-residential conversion program
articles.description:
The first completed project in the program is located at 281 Franklin St., where five floors of offices were converted into 15 apartments.

The post Tenants move into first downtown apartment in Wu’s office-residential conversion program appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Tenants have moved into 15 new apartments at 281 Franklin St.
The project is the first in Mayor Wu's office-residential conversion program.
This initiative aims to increase housing availability in downtown Boston.

articles.title: LGBTQ+ Catholics make Holy Year pilgrimage to Rome and celebrate a new feeling of welcome
articles.description:
Some wept as they walked through the Holy Door of St. Peter's Basilica in the rite of passage of Holy Year pilgrims.

The post LGBTQ+ Catholics make Holy Year pilgrimage to Rome and celebrate a new feeling of welcome appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: LGBTQ+ Catholics participated in a Holy Year pilgrimage to Rome, emphasizing inclusivity.
Pilgrims expressed deep emotions while entering St. Peter's Basilica's Holy Door.
The event fosters a sense of acceptance for Boston's LGBTQ+ Catholic community.

articles.title: Disciplinary cases tripled at Harvard due to pro-Palestine protests, student newspaper reports
articles.description:
More students were placed on probation since at least the 2017-2018 academic year, as they were disciplined for participating in pro-Palestine protests.

The post Disciplinary cases tripled at Harvard due to pro-Palestine protests, student newspaper reports appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Disciplinary cases at Harvard tripled due to pro-Palestine protests since 2017-2018.
Over 100 students faced probation for their involvement in these protests.
Increased disciplinary actions may affect student activism and campus climate in Boston.

articles.title: Photos: Music, Guinness, and lots of rain at Day 1 of Seisiún Irish music festival in Boston
articles.description:
Severe weather couldn't dampen the Irish spirit on the first day of the new festival at Suffolk Downs Saturday.

The post Photos: Music, Guinness, and lots of rain at Day 1 of Seisiún Irish music festival in Boston appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Seisiún Irish music festival launched at Suffolk Downs on September 7, 2025.
Despite heavy rain, local bands like Dropkick Murphys performed for attendees.
Festival boosts local economy by attracting visitors to Boston's cultural scene.

articles.title: Boston College football loses at Michigan State in double overtime
articles.description:
BC came tantalizingly close, behind a spectacular performance from quarterback Dylan Lonergan, but fell, 42-40, in a double-overtime thriller.

The post Boston College football loses at Michigan State in double overtime appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston College football lost to Michigan State 42-40 in double overtime on September 7.
Quarterback Dylan Lonergan delivered a standout performance, contributing significantly to the team's effort.
The loss impacts BC's season momentum and local fan morale heading into upcoming games.
